Cassia Fistula/Golden Chain tree!!

Two different trees on two different days.

![](MmYSPuR.jpg)

One next to a well frequented road and the other on a wind swept side of a hill!

![](FB_IMG_1650850613153.jpg)

The flowers are edible. The leaves, bark and the fruit pulp are medicinal.
